mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `user` WHERE dept_id = #{deptId} ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT u.* FROM `user` u INNER JOIN post_user pu ON pu.oper_code = u.id WHERE pu.post_id = #{positionId} ORDER BY u.id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user` (oper_code, oper_name, oper_status, user_type, tel_phone, phone, remark, dept_id, created_oper_name, created_at, updated_oper_name, updated_at, review_oper_name, review_time) VALUES (#{operCode}, #{operName}, #{operStatus}, #{userType}, #{telPhone}, #{phone}, #{remark}, #{deptId}, #{createdOperName}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedOperName}, #{updatedAt}, #{reviewOperName}, #{reviewTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE `user` SET oper_name = #{operName}, tel_phone = #{telPhone}, phone = #{phone}, remark = #{remark}, dept_id = #{deptId}, updated_oper_name = #{updatedOperName}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, review_oper_name = #{reviewOperName}, review_time = #{reviewTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE `user` SET oper_status = #{operStatus}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
